game.suite

Class CheckersStandardBoard

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.suite.CheckersBoard
      • game.suite.CheckersStandardBoard

  • public class CheckersStandardBoard
extends CheckersBoard
    Subclass of a board. Standard version of a Checkers Board. Has methods for creating a standard Checkers board and populating it with regular Checkers pieces. Can be used to create a standard game of Checkers.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class game.suite.CheckersBoard

        CheckersBoard.Color
